short_summary: Purchase one (1) riding mower and ancillary items, including training (if applicable), for Signal Hill NHS
description: Parks Canada has a requirement to purchase one (1) Riding Mower and ancillary items, including training (if applicable), in accordance with the Purchase Description for Riding Mowers, dated 2018-03-22, and in accordance with Annex A – Pricing and Annex B - Requirement. The delivery must be completed by March 31, 2024.",
full_summary:
Riding Mower Supply – Signal Hill NHS
=====================================================

**Tender Reference Information**
--------------------------------

* Solicitation Number: 5P300-23-0369/A
* Reference Number: cb-845-69276821
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2024-01-24
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-09T14:00:00 ( expired)

**Project Overview**
-------------------

Parks Canada requires the supply of one (1) riding mower and ancillary items, including training (if applicable), in accordance with the Purchase Description for Riding Mowers, dated 2018-03-22. The delivery must be completed by March 31, 2024.

**Bidding Requirements**
-------------------------

Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official. Please submit your bid via fax at 1-877-558-2349 or email to [soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca). Do not submit bids in person or by courier. For technical and contractual inquiries, contact the Contracting Authority.

**Pricing and Requirements**
---------------------------

The delivery must conform to the Purchase Description for Riding Mowers and the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents. The ordering party is not responsible for formatting or printing errors in the RFP documents. Late bids will not be considered.

**Key Deadline**
----------------

The contract start date is February 9, 2024, and the contract end date is March 31, 2024.

**Additional Information**
---------------------------

Please note that all work must be performed in accordance with the National Park Act and its regulations. For more information, please visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Important Contact Information**
-------------------------------

* Contracting Authority: Eric Robinson
* Email: [eric.robinson@pc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.robinson@pc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (873) 355-0824
* Fax: 1-877-558-2349

I tried to respect your guidelines, please let me know if there's anything you'd like me to change. 

Considering the **unspsc** field is populated, it helps understand what kind of good or service is being purchased. However, in the summary section, I avoided explicitly stating this
